snippet: The nation’s biggest automaker is blanketing the New York auto show with new products it hopes will improve its stagnant market share in America.
abstract: General Motors is rolling out wide series of new products at New York auto show, seizing opportunity to shift attention from safety crisis and investor revolt; president Daniel Ammann, preparing to deliver keynote speech, is unlikely to face barrage of pointed questions that overshadowed talk by GM chief executive Mary T Barra year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s biggest automaker is blanketing the New York auto show with new products it hopes will improve its stagnant market share in America.

headline.main: With Auto Show, G.M. Hopes to Lessen Damage
headline.print_headline: With Auto Show, G.M. Hopes to Lessen Damage
